sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Post = (props) => { return (

Thank you for your order!

Order Details

Date:

{props.selectedDay.toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options)}

Service:

{props.service}

Your Details

Name:

{props.user.name}

Phone:

{props.userPhone}

Address:

{props.userAddress}

{props.userNotes ? <>

Notes:

{props.userNotes}

: <> }
) } export default Post
